issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: knutanders
assignee.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The failure was seen on Win Vista, Jvm 1.5 and SunOS 5.11, Jvm 1.4.

comments.body:
I ran this test on vista with sun jdk 1.5  and didn't see a failure.  Can you try running the test with this patch to give more info with the assertion.

This is the jvm I tried with:
java version "1.5.0_13"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_13-b05)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_13-b05, mixed mode)

comments.body: I also saw this failure on a couple of machines (Solaris 10, JDK 5 and JDK 6) and committed a patch similar to the one Kathey had posted to get more details before I noticed this issue.
